blogPost.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
blogPost.body: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
blogPost.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.
blogPost.author: James Quinn

localize.description: 与你的团队激发友好竞争，提高士气，来自 Slack! 大家轮流抽签，猜测提示。你猜得越快，得到的分数就越多。非常适合在会议前、周四社交、或只是休息时使用。最多可容纳12人。
與你的團隊激發友好競爭，提高士氣，來自 Slack! 大家輪流抽籤，猜測提示。你猜得越快，得到的分數就越多。非常適合在會議前、週四社交、或只是休息時使用。最多可容納12人。

previous.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart 😁-> profit.
previous.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components

localize.description: 用https://styled-components.com/ 创建图表。一个用TS构建的反应库，几乎没有依赖性（没有d3这些东西）。导入一些默认的图表组件为Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新设计样式并添加回图表😁->利润。
用https://styled-components.com/ 創建圖表。一個用TS構建的反應庫，幾乎沒有依賴性（沒有d3這些東西）。導入一些默認的圖表組件爲Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新設計樣式並添加回圖表😁->利潤。

next.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
next.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle

localize.description: Blixi是一款轻松的益智游戏，拥有精美的neumorphic设计和创新的新鲜玩法。在不断更新的排行榜上，与来自世界各地的玩家一起争夺最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休闲游戏。
Blixi是一款輕鬆的益智遊戲，擁有精美的neumorphic設計和創新的新鮮玩法。在不斷更新的排行榜上，與來自世界各地的玩家一起爭奪最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休閒遊戲。
